name: Smartlead
description: Receives Smartlead webhook events and forwards EMAIL_REPLY events to an openclaw agent. API interaction is done by the agent via the smartlead CLI.

hookChannel.label: Delivery Channel
hookChannel.help: Usually set this for reply alerts (for example: slack, telegram, discord). If omitted, OpenClaw uses hooks default channel behavior (`last`).

hookAgentId.label: Hook Agent ID
hookAgentId.help: Optional: route webhook work to a specific agent. OpenClaw can also use the default agent.

webhookSecret.label: Smartlead Webhook Secret
webhookSecret.help: Optional. Matched against Smartlead payload `secret_key` or secret headers.
